caption: How can you not love Halal pepperoni! Best pizza for meat lovers!

I had a delivery issue with a 3rd party app. I ended up canceling and replacing the entire order 2 hours later. The customer service was exceptional even though I was a hangry customer. The staff was so kind. Mind you, I picked this up at 1:30 AM on icy roads. This is my grandma's favorite pizza place and now I know why.  PS: Call for pick up and delivery. The specials and delivery times will always be better.
Worst buffalo chicken wrap I’ve ever had.
do not trust this place and do not use atm they r scamming folks
All in all I'd say this is definitely worth a try.

They don't use gloves, none of them do!! Out of all the times not to wear gloves y'all pick a pandemic to do it. Then the girl in the front try to tell me it's okay because it's going in the oven 😳I almost wanted to smack her bank robbery wig off her head.

I ordered two large pizza with Italian sausage, pepperoni and green pepper. I received one large pizza as I ordered it no issues, but I also got a cheese pizza large that I did not order and A medium pizza that was burned on the bottom.  I spent over $50 and was not happy with the quality. I also never received a phone call asking if they can substitute any items on my order.
Fine enough. I only order the mozz sticks because they have the battered kind
Gyro ( lamb ) is off the chain.  I love it!..staff are friendly, too.

Best Pizza Bolis In Town. Pleasant Staff, great food prepared properly and delicious. Visually appetizing, palatable. I had a bad experience at a pizza bolis on 8th st by the navy yard. These guys made it so much better they even threw in a can soda for my trouble. If I could give 6 stars I would.
Very friendly and good customer services
U STREET LOCATION.  delivery driver was rude and impatient! onion rings not fully cooked! wings tasteless FIRST&LAST ordering here!!!!!! $25 down the drain 🤮
Excellent fast service, friendly  staff and a lot of pleasant things.
They make some of the best pizza pies in all of D.C hands down. And their menu prices are unbeatable too. This place is a must try!
Been ordering here a lot lately, all due the covid-19 virus. Made me a lover of pizza now i guess.
Delicious pizza! 🙂

the delivery time was very fast, and i really enjoyed the quality of their gluten free pizza. my non-gluten free partner really enjoyed his regular pizza as well! we were both impressed by how pizza boli's toppings. plus, my partner is from chicago so he has what he thinks is a higher standard for pizza!

I used to love eating here the food was great and the service was outstanding until recently! First incident I had I found a clump of blonde hair in my Philly cheesesteak as I took a bite out of it and  instead of a refund I waited 30 minutes to receive a new sandwhich which by then I was extremely turned off so I waited a few months before ordering again and wanted to give them a second chance! Today I ordered 44 dollars worth of food for my staff and did not receive the orders correctly first off, then as I checked my account balance I was charged 58 dollars.... so I called and supposedly the manager was suppose to call me and never did! So much for the great customer service! I will never eat here again!
They need to get their customer service came up because this place is not good to the customers. Luckily the food is
Delicious huge pizza
I love the pizza
My supreme pizza was hefty and well cooked
I like it
Awesome pizza!
Best pepperoni pizza around.
Love this location! Food is always made fresh, quick, and hot. Lots of menu choices and great staff. Try the app for bonus points and get your first free one-topping pizza online!
Good eats

We were in the DC area to vacation & tour. Pizza Boli's was on the hotel's recommended food list. We found this location and had hoped to walk in, place an order and sit down to eat. Unfortunately, there are no tables in the location, so that was our only downside. We ended up sitting on the stairs of a neighboring business that was already closed for the day. We ordered two stromboli's and a small cheese pizza. The stromboli is huge, and likely to be a something you'd split between two people. My nephew polished off his pizza in one sitting, while my dad and I split our stromboli's into two meals each. The crust and sauce are fantastic, as well as the cheese. Overall, good enough we decided to split a large pizza for our last night here, delivery this time!
Pizza slices are huge for only 5 bucks first time in dc pizza was awesome
Rip off. $10/slice.
Charged me for food they never delivered, then hung up on me
Great pizza, great staff, fast service, clean place.
Outstanding pizza and delicious pasta, and they're open late. Highly recommended as one of the best pizza places in the city.
It's cool and pizza is great
(Translated by Google) It is the most delicious pizza I have ever tried.  (Original) Es la pizza más deliciosa que e probado.

Pizza Boli's are great the number one thing that stick out with me is I was ordering one day and a homeless man came in and I saw them give the man a free meal plus a drink .now that's Humane they can get my business anytime for that.
Took more than a hour to get my pizza.
The pizza was very good and they delivered fast
Great customer service and great food.

I have been ordering from this location for two years with no issues. Yesterday my boss asked me to order pizza for a meeting before I left for the evening. When she came into the office today she let me know that there was a piece of metal in her pizza (yikes). It looks like the piece in the middle of a pizza roller. I called to get a refund and got the run around about it being too late/not their fault/you're lying. A driver came to pick up the leftover pizza (There were four people at the meeting and only a few slices left). I handed over the piece of metal and my receipt. The driver laughed in my face and drove away. The manager called me back, insinuated I was lying and said he would call me back. It shouldn't be this hard to get a $26 refund. I'll update my review if I get a refund...
Great pizza
Called for delivery and the hotel nearby been waiting for over 1 hour 25 min and still waiting, unbelievable
Remember AOL? Fond memories about waiting for something that was okay, but wears off after the scond time.
So much for overstuffed sub. I literally recieved a chicken cheese steak sub (whole) stuffed with lettuce.

This place may have good pizza but when you order something that they are out of instead of them telling you that they are out of it they just give you something else and you dont find out till you are all the way to your destination. That is pure bad customer service.

My WORST pizza experience ever! The managers are unprofessional and did not care that they messed up my ordered, I ordered a large extra pepperoni with green peppers. The pizza was COLD & UNCUT. I called and let the manager know he proceeded to tell me that they were about to close and I told him that’s not my problem I ordered and payed for my order to be CORRECT. After putting me on hold for 5 min I hung up and called back and finally he told me he was sending me another one , it took the pizza a hour to get here. This is the worst customer service I ever experienced and you should not have workers working that is rushing and forget to cut a pizza. A pizza Is meant to be CUT!!!!!!!! I will never order from here again. I am a manger myself and I know the steps that are suppose to be taking when a order is messed up. You ask for a refund, new pizza etc he did None of that get it together!!!!! Then the pizza they sent was uncooked . I WANT AND DESERVE A REFUND
Great food and fast service , we stayed at the residence inn and they delivered right to us ! The delivery driver was very nice as well!!

Obnoxious manager talked over the dude who is working the cash register. Then the obnoxious manager proceeded to be  very rude and deliberately slow taking my order.  Ultimately I ended up walking out and going to the next place right on the corner. Why waste time with a pimply faced manager with a chip on his shoulder? Keep on moving along the next place nearby!
I used to work here, so I might be biased
Great sauce, great crust and the service is great
Good pizza
Pizza Bolis  best
I will never eat here again. They had roaches crawling in the kitchen and when I pointed it out to them they called me a liar.
They have good comfort food. A+ service speed.
Delicious!

I have been to tbis place lots of time thr indian chaseir is too friendly to me for pick and for delivery too and they even sell slice now a day's manily the manager is so generos mr kashim  ... pizza as itss uqiue taste

The service is whatever- it doesn't matter much. But the food is super good and it's affordable. I can go to many other places and get the same thing for twice the price so it's a good budget option.

This was possibly the worst pizza I have ever eaten it was like a knock off version off papa johns dry and disgusting  the owner should turn this place into a dog food company because they are the only living things that could handle this food. Garbage!!!!!
Great food and service
I love their cheese pizza
Good Cheese Steak Sub
Damn good pizza! Delivery was quick and cheap.
Definitely above average for comfort pizza, order was ready for pickup in ten minutes.

Ordered a 6 piece traditional wing plain with a side of extra hot buffalo sauce, but received a 6 piece traditional wing in extra hot with blue cheese on the side (my 12 y/o will not eat a wing soaked in extra hot that is why we ordered it on the side). I ordered 20 boneless wings in hot buffalo with a side of spicy BBQ, but received 20 cold boneless wings soaked in regular BBQ so that I did not even know they were breaded and received no side. My wife's order was the only thing correct. She ordered and received a half cheese steak sub with grilled onions and mushrooms. We did order online, my preference all of the time because nothing can be misunderstood or interpreted incorrectly. I guess I have been proven wrong. My wife called to inform them that a majority of our order was wrong and after another 35 minutes we are still waiting on a corrected delivery (original order time 7:17 PM on 3/30/15).

We love Pizza Boli's.  It's pretty darn good pizza, you can order online as well as via phone, and we even like the fact that you can fold up the bottom of the pizza box to make a little leftover pizza container!  The online menu offers a surprising level of customization for your order.  Delivery times have always been acceptable (never longer than 40 minutes, and that was on a busy night).  So it ain't your artisanal wood-oven fired exotic toppings pie.  It's normal Neapolitan-style pizza with plenty of choices and it's good stuff.
Always consistently good.  Never had a bad pizza.  It's not wood-oven gourmet pizza, but the best pizza delivery around.

They were so rude! They were not able to understand or speak English and they blamed you! They always say: can you speak English? Do you speak English? I would say they are the ones who do not understand English at all!
